allow:
Bash(python -c "
import os
path = r''C:\\Users\\josha\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\kraken.txt''
with open\(path, ''r''\) as f:
    lines = [l.strip\(\) for l in f.readlines\(\) if l.strip\(\)]
# Parse key-value pairs or raw lines
api_key = None
api_secret = None
for line in lines:
    if ''='' in line:
        k, v = line.split\(''='', 1\)
        k = k.strip\(\).lower\(\)
        v = v.strip\(\)
        if ''key'' in k and ''secret'' not in k and ''private'' not in k:
            api_key = v
        elif ''secret'' in k or ''private'' in k:
            api_secret = v
    elif not api_key and len\(line\) > 10 and ''/'' not in line and ''@'' not in line and '' '' not in line:
        # Could be a raw key on its own line
        if api_key is None:
            api_key = line
        elif api_secret is None:
            api_secret = line

# Show structure info without exposing secrets
print\(f''Lines found: {len\(lines\)}''\)
print\(f''API Key found: {api_key is not None} \(last 4: ****{api_key[-4:] if api_key else ""N/A""}\)''\)
print\(f''API Secret found: {api_secret is not None} \(last 4: ****{api_secret[-4:] if api_secret else ""N/A""}\)''\)
print\(f''Key length: {len\(api_key\) if api_key else 0}''\)
print\(f''Secret length: {len\(api_secret\) if api_secret else 0}''\)
")
